snippet: Mirza Teletovic, an N.B.A. newcomer from the Spanish team Caja Laboral, led the Euroleague in scoring last season by averaging 21.7 points.
abstract: Brooklyn Nets hold news conference to introduce forwards Mirza Teletovic, NBA newcomer from the Spanish team Caja Laboral, and Reggie Evans, who was acquired in a sign-and-trade deal with the Los Angeles Clippers.
lead_paragraph: Mirza Teletovic, an N.B.A. newcomer from the Spanish team Caja Laboral, led the Euroleague in scoring last season by averaging 21.7 points.

headline.seo: Nets Introduce the New Additions Teletovic and Evans
headline.main: A Star in Europe Looks for a New Challenge
headline.print_headline: European Star Seeks Challenge With Nets
